title: Generating a CONTRIBUTING.md file per extension
body:
### Description

As discussed in the [Zulip dev channel](https://quarkusio.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/187038-dev/topic/What.20about.20generating.20a.20CONTRIBUTING.2Emd.20file.20per.20extension.20.3F/near/398648116), it would be good to generate a `CONTRIBUTING.md` file per extension.

When you want to contribute to an extension on Quarkiverse, you realize that some questions a contributor could have (eg. formatting the code, etc.) are answered on the main Quarkus [CONTRIBUTING](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md) file. 

It would be good to generate a `CONTRIBUTING.md` file when you bootstrap a new extension. It could just point at the Quarkus CONTRIBUTING file, and then, allowing the extension maintainers to update the file is needed.

This `CONTRIBUTING.md` file could contain something like:

```
# Contributing guide

**Want to contribute? Great!** 

First, read the [main contributing guide](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md), it will inform you about the coding guidelines, the IDE configuration or the code style we use.
```
